name: Zeus
description: Zeus, king of gods and mortals, rules over the sky, thunder, and justice. High among the clouds with Lightning Bolt in hand, he casts his gaze across the world, and all beings bow beneath his might.

skills.name: Soothing Rain
skills.description: Restores HP to allies over time.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: Grants a shield when allies fall low.
